suite.name: Amazon Test

test.name: Caso de Teste 04 - Remover Produto do Carrinho

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Acessar a home page do site Amazon.com.br
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Digitar o nome de produto "Xbox Series S" no campo de pesquisa
kw.source_name: Digitar o nome de produto "${PRODUTO}" no campo de pesquisa

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Xbox Series S' into text field '//div[contains(@class,'field')]/*[@type="text"]'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: O sistema deve exibir a tela com o resultado da pesquisa "Console Xbox Series S" listando o produto
kw.source_name: O sistema deve exibir a tela com o resultado da pesquisa ${PRODUTO} listando o produto

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: Element '//span[contains(text(), "Console Xbox Series S")]' is displayed.
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Adicionar o produto "Console Xbox Series S" no carrinho
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Adicionar o produto "Console Xbox Series S" no carrinho
Click Element

kw.name: Remover o produto "Console Xbox Series S" do carrinho
Verificar se o carrinho fica vazio
Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
